channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter on Tabard street, 15th December
item.description:
There are plastic bottles, plastic bags, food packaging and cans on the road and pavement on Tabard Street. It has been there for three days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 165, Great Dover Street, The Borough, Greater London

item.title: I0 inch pot hole outside 16 Martens Avenue, 15th December
item.description:
This pot hole is a regular issue. It’s been poorly patched up before and it’s back again. Might be worth a full road width resurface job. The noise and vibration of heavy cars and vans reaches the houses.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leysdown Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken camera for main door, 15th December
item.description:
The camera for the buzzer for the main door of the flat (1-8) is damaged. The camera is fallen off which makes it hard to see who is in front of the camera when answering someone buzzing in
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Dover Street, The Borough, Greater London

item.title: Street light not working outside 104 Coniston Road BR14JB, 15th December
item.description:
I am a pensioner living alone and rely on this light as security down a dark tree lined road outside my house . I have previously reported this issue in October . Outside 104 Coniston Road BR14JB Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coniston Road, Shortlands, Greater London

item.title: Food waste all over the street, 15th December
item.description:
Food waste is left all over the street, gets trodden on and begins to rot. The street needs deep cleaned as it's bringing pigeons, squirrels, rats, foxes to eat the waste and tear up bin bags. The vendors bring rotten food in the truck and it sits there all day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68-70, Rye Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Mattress, 15th December
item.description:
Someone has left a double mattress over the gate of Climsland house on Dutchy Street. Please come and collect it as soon as possible as it is clearly blocking the entrance for the 20 resident flats of this block.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Duchy Street, Waterloo, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish at top of close at 56 Crampton St, 15th December
item.description:
